EXPLORE COURSES Learning Solutions for Your Language Achieve your language learning goals with our specialized programs designed for all levels. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Explore LinguaVerse Language Learning Privacy Policy LinguaVerse HOME ABOUT US Services Contact Privacy Policy 1. Information We Collect We may collect personal information directly from you when you visit our website, register for our services, or communicate with us. This information may include: Personal details (e.g., name, email address, phone number) Demographic information (e.g., age, gender, language preferences) Payment information (e.g., credit card details) Communications preferences 2. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in the following ways: To provide and operate our services, including courses and language learning programs. To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content. To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and providing customer support. To process transactions and send you related information. To improve our website and services. 3. Sharing Your Information We may share your information with third parties in the following circumstances: With service providers who assist us in providing and operating our services. With your consent or as necessary to fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it. For legal purposes, such as complying with court orders, legal processes, or government requests. 4. Security of Your Information We take reasonable precautions to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. 5. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. LinguaVerse website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
